locations.name: Mani Peninsula
locations.description: A rugged and historic region in the southern Peloponnese, known for its distinctive stone tower houses, wild landscapes, and fiercely independent past. (Coordinates are approximate, centered near Areopoli as a likely base).

locations.name: Monemvasia
locations.description: A unique medieval fortress town located on a small island linked to the mainland by a causeway, offering a magical atmosphere with its car-free alleys and Byzantine history.

locations.name: Porto Heli
locations.description: A sophisticated harbour town on the eastern Peloponnese coast, known as part of the 'Greek Riviera', offering seaside relaxation and access to nearby islands.
